data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Navabi, Amin, Hajiqanbar, Hamidreza, Mortazavi, Abdolazim (2018): New species and records of the genera Scutacarus and Imparipes (Acari: Heterostigmatina: Scutacaridae) associated with Coleoptera and Hymenoptera (Arthropoda: Insecta) from Iran. Zootaxa 4531 (4): 532-540, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4531.4.4
